member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetEmployeeById(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the employee by their ID
member.param: The ID of the desired Employee
member.response: Returns Employee Details if employee id is valid otherwise it returns null with status failure

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.InventoryController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve Shelf Items and Shelf Details by Shelf Code
member.response: Return Items Present in shelf along with shelf details if shelf code is valid otherwise it returns null with status failure

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.LoginController.Login(IMS.Contracts.LoginRequest)
member.summary: Validates the user using the login credentials and returns user details and access token
member.param: Here login contains two fields named username and password
member.response: Returns user details and access token if username and password is valid otherwise it returns null and status failure

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.OrderController.GetOrdersByEmployeeId(System.String)
member.summary: Returns orders placed by an employee, returns null if no orders and if wrong employee id, returns failure
member.param: Here employee id is used to identify the employee
member.returns: entire list of employee orders along with the employee details and status
member.response: Returns list of employee orders along with the employee details if employee id is valid otherwise it returns null and status failure

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.OrderController.PlaceEmployeeOrder(IMS.Contracts.EmployeeOrder)
member.summary: Returns order placed by the employee with date and order id set
member.returns: entire employee order along with the status
member.response: Returns the employee order along with status success if it is placed, or failure incase it is not placed

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.OrderController.GetEmployeeRecentOrderDetails(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns recent order placed by the employee with employee and employee order details
member.returns: List of employee recent order along with the status
member.response: Returns the employee recent order along with status success
If Unable to show recent entries
If token is Invalid
If Username and Password credentials are not of Admin and SuperAdmin

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.OrderController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the Vendor Order By OrderId
member.response: Returns status success if order is successfully deleted otherwise returns failure if order is not deleted

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.ReportsController.GetMostConsumedItems(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve Frequently used "n" items in given date range
member.returns: Most frequently used "n" items with their quantity
member.response: Returns item with their quantity used if input is valid otherwise it returns status failure if input is not valid

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.ShelfController.Get
member.response: Returns shelves List
If shelves list is empty

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.ShelfController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Getting Shelf by it's Code and return shelf Object
member.response: Returns shelf Object
If shelf Code is Invalid

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.ShelfController.Post(IMS.Contracts.Shelf)
member.summary: Adding new Shelf and return List of shelves
member.response: Returns shelves List
If shelf is Already present

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.ShelfController.DeleteShelfByShelfCode(System.String)
member.summary: Deleting Shelf by it's Code and return List of remaining shelves
member.response: Returns remaining shelves List
If shelf is Already Deleted or Not Present in Shelf Table

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.UserController.GetUsersByRoleName(System.String)
member.summary: returns all users based on the role name
member.param: Takes the name of the role corresponding to which we need users
member.returns: all users of the role name along with status
member.response: Returns users with status

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.VendorController.GetVendorById(System.Int32)
member.summary: returns vendor object if id is present, otherwise failure
member.param: Here vendor id is used to identify the vendor
member.returns: entire vendor object along with status
member.response: Returns VendorOrder object if Vendor id is valid otherwise it returns null and status failure

member.name: M:IMS_API.Controllers.VendorController.GetAllVendors
